Mr David Cameron said in a statement: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. I wish Andy Coulson all the very best for his future, which I am certain will be a successful one.
